```{r global, include=FALSE}
# load data in 'global' chunk so it can be shared by all users of the dashboard
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(knitr)
library(DT)
df <- read_csv('Store_CA.csv')

unique_location <- unique(df$StoreLocation)
```

KPIâ€™s are key performance indicators, this dataset is a collection for retail stores which offers insights into factors including store performance, customer engagement, and financial outcomes. This helps understand the relationship between operational performance, store characteristics, and sales performance.

```{r}
library(shiny)
checkboxGroupInput(inputId = "StoreLocation_input", 
                   label = h3("Store Location"),
                   choices = unique(df$StoreLocation), 
                   inline = TRUE,
                   selected = unique(df$StoreLocation)[1])

```

Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Density Plot

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  p1 <- df %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=CompetitorDistance, color=StoreAge))+
    geom_density()
  ggplotly(p1)
})
```

### Bar Plot

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  p2 <- df %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=CompetitorDistance, fill=PromotionsCount))+
    geom_bar()
  ggplotly(p2)
})
```
